chat_description: Monitor your Twitch and Kick messages from a single view.
chat_waiting_hint: Connect your service to get started
chat_send_error: Unable to send message. Check your connection.
auth_login_description: Launch OAuth flows for Twitch or Kick and authorize the bot role you need.
auth_login_hint: Each login opens a new tab. After completing it, come back and refresh the bot.
auth_login_error: Unable to open the login flow. Try again.
auth_login_success: Flow launched. Finish it in the new tab.
construction_subtitle: Soon you will be able to configure your automations here.
